Texts.Chs: 把^green;9个铜线^reset;带给^orange;维纳利斯^reset;。
我刚才^green;评估您的价值^reset;，而您通过了评估。 您的思维敏锐，我认为您将成为科学界的财富。^orange;谢谢您，探员^reset;
Texts.Eng: I was ^green;testing your worth^reset; and you passed the test. Your mind is sharp, and I think you'll be an asset to the scientific community. Thank you, ^orange;Agent^reset;.

Texts.Chs: 请立即使用您的^orange;加工台^reset;，制造9件^orange;铜线^reset;并将其带给我。 我将为您的^green;传送器^reset;评估修复程序，以便您可以^green;转至遥远的位置^reset;，例如orange;科学前哨站！
Texts.Eng: Use your ^orange;Machining Table^reset; now, and create 9 ^orange;Wire^reset; and bring them to me. I'll jury-rig a fix for your ^green;Teleporter^reset; so that you can ^green;warp to distant locations^reset; such as the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;!
